tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crime_statistics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    incident_location VARCHAR(255),
    crime_type VARCHAR(100),
    crime_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CrimeStatistics (
 crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 crime_date DATE,
 crime_type VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_date DATE,
 incident_type VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255),
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CrimeAnalysis (
 analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 analysis_date DATE,
 crime_type VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255),
 analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crimes (
    crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date_reported DATE
)

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_id INT,
    description TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE suspects (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    crime_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE crime_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_id INT,
    analyst_name VARCHAR(255),
    analysis_date DATE,
    findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CrimeReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    report_location TEXT,
    crime_type TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CrimeStatistics (
    crime_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type TEXT,
    total_reports INT,
    arrest_count INT,
    crime_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Suspects (
    suspect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    suspect_name TEXT,
    age INT,
    gender TEXT,
    address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Witnesses (
    witness_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    witness_name TEXT,
    contact_number TEXT,
    statement TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentDetails (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    incident_location TEXT,
    officer_name TEXT,
    status TEXT
)
